name: Dockge
short_description: Self-hosted Docker Compose stack manager with GUI for easy deployment.
description: Self-hosted Docker Compose stack manager with GUI for easy deployment. Dockge is a self-hosted application focused on docker, management, containers, devops. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Dockge on your home server to self-hosted docker compose stack manager with gui for easy deployment without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Dockge to manage your docker workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
